synopsis: The gang find a magic picture book. When Crescent feels unnoticed, he goes to lengths trying to destroy the whale inside.
When the gang go on a road trip, Crescent learns the strange and horrifying truth behind the rainbow they are approaching.
When their hot air balloon bursts and great heights, the gang are forced to come up with creative methods to avoid a plummet to their deaths.
Crescent is heartbroken when Funny rejects the homemade birthday cake made especially for her.
When Crescent crashes the car, the gang are forced to spent the night outdoors in the snow with only three matches to keep them warm.
When Crescent finds that he is cut off in every picture of Funny's photo album, he sets up an elaborate action stunt in order to get her attention and the best photos.
Crescent decides that Corona's round head is the source of his attention, and attempts to alter his own head to the shape of a full moon.
